comments.body:
This differs from pyfunc serve. PyFunc serve has 2 endpoints:
   GET /ping -> return 200 if healthy
   POST /invocations -> run prediction

Can we rename  /predict -> /invocations and add a /ping endpoint (/invocations might not be the best name, we can also consider renaming that to predict in pyfunc. )? Do we need the other extra endpoints? Does the server differentiate between GET  and POST?
